creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Bound with green silk-like thread at the top, sharpie marker inscription and pill collage elements on reflective coated paper cover; 14 pp.
inscription: front cover, black sharpie marker: Candy, masqueRADE with me - oh can you masqueRADE? / Can I know a thing or 2 - oh, can you be a thing? / Candy, be a you today - oh can\'t you see a thing?- / A thing beside a masquerade- / A way to tunnel through
medium: Xerography, screenprint, collage elements, black sharpie; bound volume
title: 2009 Free Calendar
